wheel_sensitivity_popover.text: Be careful! This setting will RELOAD the page and is SAVED on the pc. (Default is 1)

NewSettingControls.save_graph_pos_tooltip: Save the current layout on the server (as "Server-Saved" layout)
NewSettingControls.save_current_layout_tooltip: Download the current graph, as is into a json file
NewSettingControls.load_layout_tooltip: Load previous saved graph (.json) into current panel (hit "Save Graph Position" if you want the loaded graph to be saved as the server layout)

item0.footer:
**__General Movement:
 -Click and drag the mouse on a node to move it
  -Only in "Server-Saved" layout will each move be saved and shared
 -Click and drag outside of a node to move the graph
 -Scroll to zoom in and out

item1.footer:
**__Selecting nodes:
 -Hold Shift or Ctrl and click on nodes to select them
  -Selected nodes have a pink color
 -Hold Shift and drag the mouse to create a selection box

item2.footer:
**__Right click a node to open the context menu:
 - Download: Download corresponding snap file.
 - Favor: Mark a node for all to see.
 - Edit: Change node values.
 - Collapse: Collapse all nodes beneath into one.

NameDialog.title: Change node name
NameDialog.description: The given value will be displayed as name for this node in the graph.
NameDialog.label: Node Name
